original_text: The temple servants lived on Ophel Hill. Ziha and Gishpa had authority over them. The temple servants lived on Ophel Hill. Ziha and Gishpa had authority over them.
korean_text: 느디님 사람은 오벨에 거주하니 시하와 기스바가 그들의 책임자가 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: The temple servants lived on Ophel Hill.
Ziha and Gishpa had authority over them.
The temple servants lived on Ophel Hill.
Ziha and Gishpa had authority over them.
